targets.expr: topk(5, sum by (container) (sum_over_time(loki:rule:errors:rate:1m[10m])*60 or vector(0) + sum_over_time(loki:rule:warnings:rate:1m[10m])*60 or vector(0)))
topk(5, sum by (namespace, container) (sum_over_time(loki:rule:errors:rate:1m[$__range])*60 or vector(0) + sum_over_time(loki:rule:warnings:rate:1m[$__range])*60 or vector(0)))
